title: Sunny High Floor Studio on 15th Floor near MGH (July 15)
neighborhood: Boston: Hawthorne Pl, Charles River Park, West End
map_address: 9 Hawthorne Place near William Cardinal O'Connell Way
posting_body: ['Very large studio apartment on 15th Floor of Hawthorne Place condominium in Charles River Park luxury development in West End neighborhood of downtown Boston.', 'Large windows and a sliding glass door create a very sunny, light atmosphere.', ' Excellent high-floor view of the downtown skyline, the Zakim-Bunker Hill Bridge, as well as a bit of the harbor and river.', ' 24-hour concierge in well-appointed lobby.', ' 550 square feet plus a 100 square foot private balcony.', ' The apartment feels even larger with the expansive view to the horizon.', 'Rent includes heat, air conditioning and natural gas for hot water and cooking, a considerable savings amounting to about $300 in either the peak winter or summer months.', ' Dishwasher and disposal in spacious galley kitchen with pass-through window to dining area.', ' Upscale gas stove is near new.', 'Hardwood parquet floors were refinished recently.', ' Ample roomy closets in entry hallway and vestibule dressing area.', ' High speed internet service from your choice of Comcast or RCN.', ' Modern laundry facility and bike storage available in building.', '  Please see photos below.', 'Tennis courts available at a nominal charge, fitness club with large outdoor lap pool and year-round indoor pool in adjoining building for $84 per month for an individual membership, with MGH discount offered.', 'Parking available for $275-300 per month, depending on whether indoor garage (elevator access in same building) or outdoor parking deck.', 'Hawthorne Place consists of two seventeen-story buildings in Charles River Park, 48 acres of beautifully landscaped grounds in the West End neighborhood of downtown, immediately north of Beacon Hill and just east of the Esplanade with its running and biking trails.', ' Charles River Park is a quiet oasis of trees and brick walkways, punctuated with several park benches, all in the midst of bustling downtown Boston.', ' Please see the website <URL> for more detail as well as an extensive photo gallery of the common areas.', ' Hawthorne Place was one of the first Boston area condominiums to prohibit smoking in all units and indoor common areas.', ' Professional building management is based on site for rapid and convenient service.', 'Home - Hawthorne Place: The Condominium at Charles River Park', 'Find a new and beautiful home at the premier condominiums at Hawthorne Place.', 'We provide Boston residents with p...', 'Perfect location for new medical residents or other personnel at Mass General Hospital because the building is a 45-second walk to MGH or Mass Eye & Ear Infirmary.', ' Steps to TD Banknorth Center/North Station, Whole Foods Supermarket, J. Pace & Son (gourmet meals to go at reasonable prices), Cold Stone Creamery Ice Cream, CVS as well as other retail shops.', ' Convenient to green, red, blue and orange lines on the T, commuter lines, Zipcar and Partners Shuttle stop for transportation to MIT and Longwood Medical Area.', 'Available August 1.', ' Current tenant has flexibility in departure date, so a move-in date in July is possible.', 'Please email, text or call for details:  (203) 856-8148.', ' (I can provide glowing -- I hope -- landlord references.', ' How often do you see that?)', 'For rent by owner so there will be no broker’s fee.', ' However, like many doorman buildings in downtown Boston, the on-site management company charges a one-time $300 move-in fee paid to the building itself.', ' First and last month’s rent, with no security deposit.', 'Here is a guide to the photos above:', '(1)   Living area and balcony', '(2)   View from balcony east toward downtown skyline', '(3)   Vestibule dressing area and bathroom', '(4)   Kitchen', '(5)   Lobby', '(8)   Outdoor lap pool of fitness club', '(9)   Aerial view of West End, Boston (Hawthorne Place is twin brown buildings immediately to left of center, fronted by trees and park)', '(6)   Landscaping of grounds in front of building', '(7)   Laundry']
